name: The First One (Onganne)
description: As the First One being in this foreign territory, obstacles will keep on coming the longer you continue to stay “alive”. To handle the increasing number of asteroids and enemy ships, you have to steer your ship with the arrow keys and shoot by aiming with the mouse and spamming right-click. However, some asteroids will not be able to break so do remember to move and shoot to make sure… There could also be special bombs you can collect by shooting it too. Using the bomb will destroy all obstacles in your screen, just press the left-click button. Is there an end to this? How much bread have you eaten in your life?
